Response.Say: If you are experiencing an immediate medical emergency, please hang up and dial your local emergency response
Please enter your age using the keypad.
Please enter a number corresponding to your gender. 1 for female, 2 for male, 3 for other.
Please enter the urgency of your medical needs on a scale of one to five.
Please enter the date of your availability in 6 digits.
For example, January first of twenty fifteen would be 0 1 0 1 1 5.
Enter your ideal time of day. Press 1 for morning, 2 for afternoon, and 3 for evening.

Thank you for calling VillageMed. We will try to schedule an appointment for you on August 11 between 3 and 5 in the evening. A text message will be sent to you to confirm your appointment within the next 48 hours. We hope to get you feeling better soon. Good bye.
